ygData.subject: Re: Extremely P.O.'d
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm...  You may want to forward their names and the incident, in detail, to Verant.  I think they ld like to know how they found out also (and considering
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm... You may want to forward their names and the incident, in detail, to
Verant. I think they'ld like to know how they found out also (and
considering Verant's stance on out-of-game sales, they may be willing to
consider it as harrassment >;o)~ ).

-=B=-
The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua R. Moore <josh@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 9:12 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Extremely P.O.'d


>From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
>Ok, I am really bloody Mad now. I was contacted In-game by these morons
last
>night, after getting my character back. They seemed to have known about my
>"accident" and then offered to sell me, buy things from me over the net
with
>real money (hackles raise) http://www.global-ent-services.com/eq.htm
>
>
>
>To top it all off, they live close to me in Michigan.
>
>
>
>How did they know my character was deleted? And then they have the nerve to
>ask me to buy things from them with a credit card!
>
>
>
>I can not, and will not stand for having to buy things with real money for
>an online game! Nothing upsets me more than people who FARM items to sell
on
>Ebay, or whatever or wherever they sell. Get a damn job. Don't rob me of
>having fun in an online game so you can make a damn profit!
>
>
>
>I cannot even gather my thoughts, I am so mad.
>
>
>
>Any thoughts are appreciated. This is just wrong, in my opinion.
>
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>Was the salesman clueless? Productopia has the answers.
><a href=" http://clickme.onelist.com/ad/productopiacpc2 ">Click Here</a>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>

with the subject submissions.
>
